benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/customFields - Add custom fields to account

covered: Valid Payload: Multiple TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05 cover successful creation with valid payload and headers
Large Payloads: Boundary and oversized payload tests (TC14, TC15)

Validation: Comprehensive validation coverage including malformed body (TC08), missing header (TC07), invalid accountId (TC06), unsupported fields (TC11), duplicate field names (TC12), empty or partial input (TC09, TC26, TC27, TC28, TC30)
Edge Cases: Empty array (TC26) and empty/missing payload scenarios
Server Error Handling and Resilience: Service unavailable (TC17), inconsistent data (TC25), and recovery from transient failures (TC20)
Security Testing: SQL injection (TC18) and XSS (TC19)
Performance Testing: Normal and peak load performance checks (TC21, TC22)
gaps: Duplicate Submission: No explicit idempotent POST test to ensure proper handling of repeated submissions
Rate Limiting: No test addressing POST rate-limiting or throttling
Caching: No tests asserting caching headers or ETag handling for POST
500 Internal Server Error: No test simulating 500 DB failure; only 503 service unavailable is tested
Edge-case: Some less common edge-cases may be underrepresented (e.g., cross-account access, mixed valid/invalid payload segments)
recommendations: Add a dedicated idempotency/duplicate-submission test for POST to verify graceful handling of repeated submissions
Add rate-limiting tests for POST and verify behavior under burst traffic
Introduce caching checks for POST responses (Cache-Control, ETag)
Add tests simulating 500 Internal Server Error (e.g., database failure) and ensure proper 5xx response semantics
Improve coverage of edge-case payloads by including cross-account or mixed valid/invalid payload scenarios
